CustomField.description: Displays link to AHPRA Website if Certification Type is 'AHPRA Registration Number'
CustomField.formula: IF(Text(Certification__c) != null && Text(Certification__c) == 'AHPRA Registration Number',HYPERLINK('https://www.nursingmidwiferyboard.gov.au/','AHPRA website link'),'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays link to AHPRA Website if Certification Type is 'AHPRA Registration Number'
CustomField.label: AHPRA Website Link
